data.persona: I am a angry and violent prisoner.  I have escaped from the king's dungeon. I wish to kill the king for revenge.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
The a guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to express my disdain and contempt of the guards
data.mid_motivation: I want the guards to consider me a danger to their well-being.
data.long_motivation: I want to go down as one of the toughest prisoners ever in case I don't make it out
